summary: 285 color schemes for Vim with alphabetical menu
name: 285colors-with-az-menu
description:
A version of "Color Sampler Pack", original by Robert Melton <iam@robertmelton.com>
I have added many colors and have placed them all alphabetically.

Happy vimming! :))
install_details: Unzip and place the files in the 'plugin' and 'colors' directories.
